title: Accardo
author: Accardo
content: The Microsoft GitHub have decided to implement AI completely on the platform to communicate with developers and customers. They want to cut cost and save up more money for other projects. Hence, Github will operate as usual without any problems, its available for developers 24hrs. AI will remove lots of people from work looking at the way tech companies choose A.I over engineers and techies. Tech guys and engineers contributed in building AI and it's taking their jobs from them. At first I didn't think of AI taking over the jobs of techies and engineers, I thought content writers would run out of jobs, but it seems AI will affect tech guys more. What do you think? https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/github-microsoft-layoffs-microsofts-github-lays-off-142-india-staffers-all-techies-fired-report-3902373

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: This is both sad and disheartening to imagine these engineers building these AIs' unaware that they will be replaced by this Artificial intelligence its like they got a stone and hit it in their head, I also thought that AI is a tool to help writers but they have created a very intelligent AIs' because I thought human engineers are intelligent enough t get replaced by these AIs'excerpt from the article you providedÂ QuoteThe spokesperson added that the company's focus is to ensure that GitHub is a fully-integrated platform powered by artificial intelligence (AI) for developers and customers.I wonder after this what profession these AI are going to replace, this is quite scary for our children who go to school to get educated but they are up against this AI.

comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on March 31, 2023, 01:37:31 PMI wonder after this what profession these AI are going to replace, this is quite scary for our children who go to school to get educated but they are up against this AI.So thought those who worked on handlooms and were replaced by machines. Or those who worked in the fields. Let's have a bit of historical perspective:A history of jobs replaced by technology, and the new jobs that it created

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Accardo on March 31, 2023, 12:07:07 PMThey want to cut cost and save up more money for other projects their pockets.Don't be surprised that AI replaces people, because for most employers, people are just numbers, and besides, they go on annual vacations, sick leave, maternity leave, and constantly complain about their low wages. AI solves all these "problems" and, as they say, increases efficiency, and those at the top will profit more than before - for them, in any case, it's a win-win situation.After all, how can you compete with something that can do your whole day's work in just a few minutes?

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on March 31, 2023, 02:08:34 PMAfter all, how can you compete with something that can do your whole day's work in just a few minutes?These are profit-driven companies so expect them to cut their cost and find ways to minimize their spending, this is bound to happen we have seen it in movies, in our motivation to make our lives easy with the help of these AI and robots we are losing our livelihood and our children, in the present day we have so many job fewer professionals and now those who are employed will be replaced by AI that these genius engineers created to help them.They are not being created to help but to replace humans and this is a worse future scenario
